Introduction
This topic contains information about evaluating other gynecological disorders, including
SC for disorders of menstruation
evaluating pelvic organ prolapse
malignant neoplasms of the gynecological system
disfigurement due to benign or malignant neoplasms
cervical dysplasia
human papillomavirus (HPV)
, and
changes in the rating schedule for gynecological conditions and disorders of the breast
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section AÂ - Disabilities of the Gynecological System
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section A
